definitions.definition: An obstruction causing an embolism : a blood clot , air bubble or other matter carried by the bloodstream and causing a blockage or occlusion of a blood vessel .
The structure on the end of the palp of male arachnids which contains the opening to the ejaculatory duct.

main_definition: ( pathology ) An obstruction causing an embolism : a blood clot , air bubble or other matter carried by the bloodstream and causing a blockage or occlusion of a blood vessel .
secondary_definitions: ( zoology ) The structure on the end of the palp of male arachnids which contains the opening to the ejaculatory duct.
